name: SQL Murder Mystery
description:
There was a murder in SQL City and the detective need your help! Your job is to find all the evidence, make connections, and pinpoint the murderer using SQL queries. The police department's database is packaged with a simple SQL console for all your detective need, so just download and start right away!

This was a short project I made for my DBMS class. It used a buggy SQLite library, so it may not run properly on your computer. (If that's the case, then I'm super sorry :< )

Adapted from the fantastic SQL Murder Mystery (knightlab.com). I did not make the database nor the storyline. Credits go to the authors at knightlab.com.
